refnamediv.refpurpose: hypergeometric functions Perform hypergeometric functions in a query expression

refsect1.title: Library
refsect1.para: The hypergeometric functions reside in the Linear Algebra library. Run the following query to load this library:AFL% load_library('linear_algebra');

row.entry: hypergeometric cumulative distribution hypergeometric cumulative distribution. x is the number of white marbles drawn without replacement from a jar. m is the number of white marbles in the jar. n is the number of black marbless in the jar. k is the number of marbless drawn from the jar. lower_tail is TRUE for lower-tail quantile, FALSE for upper-tail.

hypergeometric probability mass function hypergeometric probability mass function. x is the number of white marbles drawn without replacement from an jar. m is the number of white marbless in the jar. n is the number of black marbles in the jar. k is the number of marbles drawn from the jar.

hypergeometric quantile function Hypergeometric quantile function. p is probability between 0 and 1 (inclusive). m is the number of white marbles in the jar. n is the number of black marbless in the jar. k is the number of marbles drawn from the jar. lower_tail is TRUE for lower-tail quantile, FALSE for upper-tail.
hygequant(p: double, m:double, n:double, k:double, lower_tail:boolean)
